title: [docs] Clearify requirement of app_manifest's default value

labels.name: type: documentation
labels.description: Need to update the API documentation

body:
### Describe the bug

Failure to locate the program input point TaskDialogIndirect to the dynamic library

### Reproduction

        let mut windows = tauri_build::WindowsAttributes::new();
        windows = windows.app_manifest(include_str!("manifest.xml"));
        tauri_build::try_build(tauri_build::Attributes::new().windows_attributes(windows))
             .expect("failed to run build script");

```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<assembly xmlns="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:asm.v1" manifestVersion="1.0">
    <trustInfo xmlns="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:asm.v3">
        <security>
            <requestedPrivileges>
                <requestedExecutionLevel level="requireAdministrator" uiAccess="false"/>
            </requestedPrivileges>
        </security>
    </trustInfo>
</assembly>


run program
Failure to locate the program input point TaskDialogIndirect to the dynamic library
### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Platform and versions

```text
Environment
  › OS: Windows 11 x64
  › MSVC: 
      - Visual Studio Community 2019
  › Node.js: 18.13.0
  › npm: 9.4.2
  › rustup: 1.25.2
  › rustc: 1.68.2
  › cargo: 1.68.2
  › Rust toolchain: stable-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc 

Packages
  › @tauri-apps/cli [NPM]: 1.2.2
  › @tauri-apps/api [NPM]: 1.2.0
  › tauri [RUST]: 2.0.0-alpha.8,
  › tauri-build [RUST]: 2.0.0-alpha.4,

App
  › build-type: all
  › distDir: ../dist
  › devPath: http://localhost:5173/
  › framework: Vue3
  › bundler: Rollup
```


### Stack trace

_No response_

_No response_
